text: ittae hananim-eun geudaeui hyeonmong-eseo geudeul-i sosulo boidolog ha yeoss-euni geubunkkeseo geudeul-i dasulo boidolog hayeossdamyeon neohuineun bunmyeong banghwanghago seolo bunjaenghayeoss-eulila geuleona hananim-eun geudaeleul gujehayeoss-euni sillo geubun-eun simjung-ui modeun bimil-eul algo gyesim-ila
